jobDescription: Data Analyst - Permanent Role - Austin, TX  We are searching for an Data Analyst with the ability to lead the data mapping, reporting and documentation. The client is a well-funded start-up in the Fintech industry and they are adapting new accounting applications with the biggest brands in expanding their data scope. They are the only one in this space and have a strong ownership/management team leading their continued success. As a career opportunity, this an ideal environment for a Data Analyst with technical experience to grow within a determined culture.  Responsibilities: Develop internal tracking and reporting for data usage in databasesCreate tools and modify procedures to improve efficiency and accuracyWork with key stakeholders, internal users, and developers to define and discuss business intelligence needsBuild database tables for database maintenance and reporting Required Skills: 3+ year as a Data AnalystStrong understanding of database design, database development and analyzing dataKnowledge of Transact-SQL, Excel, and AccessBachelor's Degree in Information Systems Management, Accounting or Computer Science Desired Skills: Prior Experience in Financial Services industry
